action.action-desc: Mr. Torres of New York (for himself, Ms. Ocasio-Cortez, and Mr. Carter of Louisiana) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 to include certain safety requirements, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as River’s Law.

section.header: Safety requirements for child care providers
section.text: Section 658E(c)(2)(I) of the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 (42 U.S.C. 9858c(c)(2)(I)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in clause (i)(XI), by striking ; and and inserting a semicolon;
by redesignating clause (ii) as clause (iii); and
by inserting after clause (i) the following:

subclause.text: a prohibition on constructing, maintaining, or otherwise operating a pool on the premises of any facility where such services are provided; and
a requirement to install door and window alarms in any facility where such services are provided; and
